channel.title: Trophy Gold: The Death Ziggurat
channel.description:
**Trophy Gold: The Death Ziggurat** Thursdays in June, 8:00 PM EDT (UTC-4)
*"Find the ziggurat and stop the demon from laying waste to our world before the true time!"* So said the Pharasmin priests as they hired you to investigate hints of a demon escaping her ziggurat prison deep within the Cinderlands.
[Session One](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MayWmExbwesvoSQE8Dr) [Session Two](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MayWoPjFhdjgc5qrvn1) [Session Three](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MayWpaScdDq5lOukDZ7) [Session Four](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MayWw-EkySz0fIh60vV)
(Note: Session Four is during GCOG.)
